lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "Whatever option is selected, the combination of the favorable economic environment, FNMA's recent move to financial health, the current strength of the housing market and the evolution of FNMA's role in the mortgage market from contributor to competitor would all indicate that the time is ripe for a positive move toward privatization," the report concluded.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Fannie Mae's critics, including some Reagan administration officials espousing a free-market philosophy, say government sponsorship of the agency allows it to compete unfairly with private lenders and investors.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: S. Department of Housing and Urban Development (HUD) said it backed an eventual severing of the link between the government and the Federal National Mortgage Association -- better known as Fannie Mae.

lst.name: sentence
